mapper.select: SELECT MENU_NO AS "menuNo" , MENU_NM AS "menuNm" FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE MENU_NO != '0' AND binary(UPPER_MENU_NO) = #{upperMenuId} ORDER BY MENU_ORDR

SELECT A.MENU_NO AS "menuNo" , A.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , B.MENU_NO AS "subMenuNo" , B.MENU_NM AS "subMenuNm" , B.UPPER_MENU_NO AS "upperMenuId" , B.MENU_ORDR AS "menuOrdr" , B.MENU_DC AS "menuDc" FROM COMTNMENUINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNMENUINFO B ON A.MENU_NO = B.UPPER_MENU_NO WHERE binary(A.MENU_NO) = #{menuNo} AND A.MENU_NO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.MENU_ORDR

SELECT A.UPPER_MENU_NO AS "upperMenuId" , A.MENU_NO AS "menuNo" , A.MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , A.MENU_ORDR AS "menuOrdr" , B.PROGRM_File_NM AS "progrmId" , B.PROGRM_KOREAN_NM AS "progrmNm" , A.MENU_DC AS "menuDc" , A.USE_AT AS "useAt" FROM COMTNMENUINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNPROGRMLIST B ON A.PROGRM_FILE_NM = B.PROGRM_FILE_NM WHERE binary(A.UPPER_MENU_NO) = #{menuNo} ORDER BY A.MENU_ORDR
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNMENUINFO (MENU_NO, MENU_ORDR, MENU_NM, UPPER_MENU_NO, MENU_DC, PROGRM_FILE_NM, USE_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{menuNo}, #{menuOrdr}, #{menuNm}, #{upperMenuId}, #{menuDc}, #{progrmFileNm}, #{useAt}, sysdate(), #{registerId}, sysdate(), #{registerId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE MENU_ORDR = #{menuOrdr}, MENU_NM = #{menuNm}, MENU_DC = #{menuDc}, PROGRM_FILE_NM = #{progrmFileNm}, USE_AT = #{useAt}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{registerId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(MENU_NO) AS totcnt FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE binary(MENU_NM) like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT MENU_NO AS menuNo , MENU_ORDR AS menuOrdr , MENU_NM AS menuNm , UPPER_MENU_NO AS upperMenuId , MENU_DC AS menuDc , RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS relateImagePath , RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS relateImageNm , PROGRM_FILE_NM AS progrmFileNm FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE MENU_NO = #{searchKeyword}

SELECT MENU_NO AS menuNo , MENU_ORDR AS menuOrdr , MENU_NM AS menuNm , UPPER_MENU_NO AS upperMenuId , MENU_DC AS menuDc , RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS relateImagePath , RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS relateImageNm , PROGRM_FILE_NM AS progrmFileNm FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE Menu_NO > 0 ORDER BY MENU_ORDR
SELECT COUNT(MENU_NO) AS totcnt FROM COMTNMENUINFO
